EmailTemplate.name: TSE-2017-04-HPE London Meetup.HPE Invitation
EmailTemplate.subject: You’re invited: HPE London Tech Meetup on May 18
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
You're Invited
Hewlett Packard Enterprise are excited to host theirr first tech meetup event for UK Financial Services and Insurance customers on May 18th at their London HQ. This informal, drop-in event targeted at Architects and Engineers, is an opportunity for HPE to introduce you to a selection of their innovative go-to-market partners – Scality <[[http://www.scality.com/]]>, Turbonomic <[[https://turbonomic.com/]]>, CTERA <[[http://www.ctera.com/]]> and ActiveViam <[[https://activeviam.com/]]> who each have bespoke capabilities in software-defined datacentre optimisation and are trusted by banking and insurance institutions across Europe. HPE will bring the light refreshments and drinks, just bring yourself! Location: Hewlett Packard Enterprise 1 Aldermanbury London EC2V 7HR Date: 18th May Time: 18:00-20:30 Registration opens March 29, 2017 at 9:00am! <[[http://fasttracks.info/2p1NJ]]>
